means: 雅司病（人体内一种热带传染病）
<术>（船）偏航，偏离航线( yaw的第三人称单数 )

word_mean: 雅司病：雅司螺旋体(Treponema pertenue)引起的热带地方性传染病，通过直接接触皮肤损害或污染物传播，多见于热带地区15岁以下儿童。临床分三期：初期在螺旋体进入部位(一般为下肢或足部)出现原发性肉芽肿，即雅司母疹
然后体积逐渐增大，结痂，自然愈合，遗留瘢痕。此后全身分批出现继发性肉芽肿性丘疹，一再复发。晚期症象包括皮肤和骨关节的破坏性畸形损害

sentence.Network_en: Many spirochetes are pathogens that cause yaws and syphilis.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多螺旋体是病原体,会导致雅司病(热带肉芽肿)、梅毒.

sentence.Network_en: Any group of spirochetes genus Treponema , including those that cause syphilis, pinta, and yaws.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多螺旋体是病原体,会导致雅司病(热带肉芽肿) 、 梅毒 、 以及回归热等.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: probably from Carib yaya, from a South American Indian language

entry.def: If an aircraft or a ship yaws, it turns to one side so that it changes the direction in which it is moving.

example.ex: As the plane climbed to 370 feet, it started yawing...
example.tran: 飞机攀升到370英尺时，开始偏航。

example.ex: He spun the steering-wheel so that we yawed from side to side.
example.tran: 他急速打着舵轮，把我们搞得摇来晃去的。

means.word_mean: 1. an infectious tropical disease resembling syphilis in its early stages; marked by red skin eruptions and ulcerating lesions
